domestic:CaseAugmentation.description: Information required to initiate a new domestic case in a court.  Domestic includes divorces, legal separations, annulment, child custody and visitation, paternity, child support, and domestic violence cases.

domestic:DomesticCaseOrder.description: Information concerning a court order in a domestic case.

domestic:DomesticViolencePetition.description: Information concerning a petition for domestic violence restraining or protective order.

ecf:CaseCauseOfActionCode.description: The legal ground on which the request for relief is based.  Allowed values set forth in court policy. Example: the basis(es) for relief in a civil case; the grounds for divorce in a state that does not recognize no-fault divorce; grounds for entry of an order of protection in a domestic violence case.

hs:ParentChildAssociation.description: An association between a child and a person who is in a parent role toward that child.

hs:PersonCaseAssociation.description: A relationship between a person and a case.

nc:PersonUnionAssociation.description: An association between two persons who are in a state of union with each other.

domestic:ChildSuportText.description: Description of temporary child support award that the court is being asked to order.

domestic:CourtFindingsText.description: A description of the findings of the court.

domestic:CustodyDescriptionText.description: Description of temporary custody award that court is being asked to include in the order.

domestic:DomesticCaseOrder.description: Information concerning a court order in a domestic case.

domestic:DomesticCaseOrderType.description: Information concerning a court order in a domestic case.

domestic:CourtFindingsText.description: A description of the findings of the court.

domestic:DomesticCaseOrderTypeText.description: Category of order, including Establish, Modify, Enforce, Modify and Enforce, and Vacate.

domestic:FinancialObligation.description: A responsibility of a party in a case ordered by a court.

nc:ActivityDisposition.description: A result or outcome of an activity.

nc:ActivityIdentification.description: An identification that references an activity.

nc:CaseDisposition.description: An outcome or processing of a case.

domestic:DomesticCaseOrderTypeText.description: Category of order, including Establish, Modify, Enforce, Modify and Enforce, and Vacate.

domestic:DomesticViolencePetition.description: Information concerning a petition for domestic violence restraining or protective order.

domestic:DomesticViolencePetitionType.description: Information concerning a petition for domestic violence restraining or protective order.

domestic:ChildSuportText.description: Description of temporary child support award that the court is being asked to order.

domestic:CustodyDescriptionText.description: Description of temporary custody award that court is being asked to include in the order.

domestic:RespondentDangerAlertindicator.description: Whether the person against whom a proposed order would be entered should be considered a danger to others, including law enforcement officers responding to a domestic disturbance call.

j:ProtectionOrder.description: A civil order, issued by a court, protecting one individual from another.

domestic:FinancialObligation.description: A responsibility of a party in a case ordered by a court.

domestic:FinancialObligationType.description: A financial responsibility of a party in a case ordered by a court.

domestic:IncomeAttachedIndicator.description: Indicates whether the responsible party income should be attached.

domestic:ObligationPaymentAmount.description: he amount owed each payment period.

hs:StateDisbursementIndicator.description: True if the child-support order directs the obligor to make payments to a state agency for disbursement to the custodial parent; false otherwise.

nc:ObligationDueAmount.description: An amount of a payment obligation that has not been made.

nc:ObligationEntity.description: An entity that must fulfill an obligation.

nc:ObligationExemption.description: A waiving or dismissal of an obligation.

nc:ObligationRecipient.description: An entity to whom an obligation must be fulfilled.

nc:ObligationRecurrence.description: A periodic basis on which an obligation must be met.

nc:ObligationRequirementDescriptionText.description: A description of what is necessary in order to fulfill an obligation.

domestic:IncomeAttachedIndicator.description: Indicates whether the responsible party income should be attached.

domestic:ObligationPaymentAmount.description: he amount owed each payment period.

domestic:RespondentDangerAlertindicator.description: Whether the person against whom a proposed order would be entered should be considered a danger to others, including law enforcement officers responding to a domestic disturbance call.
